Episode.EpisodeName: From a Cradle to a Grave
Episode.GuestStars: |Alexa Yeames|Eka Darville|Elyse Levesque|Natalie Dreyfuss|Nathan Parsons|Raney Branch|Sebastian Roché|Shannon Eubanks|Steven Krueger|Yasmine Al-Bustami|Chase Coleman|Peta Sergeant|
Episode.Overview: As the baby’s due date draws near, Klaus and Elijah embark on a search for Hayley, while Hayley herself is determined to do whatever it takes to keep her unborn baby safe and away from the witches. Francesca takes a meeting with Oliver and Jackson to determine the future of the werewolves in New Orleans. In the aftermath of a surprising attack on Marcel and his vampires at the compound, Davina and Cami join resources to take down Klaus. Finally, in a desperate move to protect those most important to him, Klaus makes a heartbreaking decision.
